backend/main.mo: IC canister with user profile CRUD, access control, blob storage mixins, and legacy post/event models and creation logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing coloring‑page removal tasks, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including pages, components, hooks, and content files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, theme provider, age gate, and route tree for all site pages.
frontend/src/components/AgeGate.tsx: Age‑verification wrapper requiring 18+ confirmation via localStorage before rendering child content.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Header auth UI handling II login, admin claim action, profile display name, and sign‑out dropdown.
frontend/src/components/community/PostAc: Provides edit and delete buttons with dialogs for modifying or removing a post.
frontend/src/components/community/PostCo: Handles comment display, toggling, and submission for a post with authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/community/PostIm: Displays an image attachment by converting raw bytes into a blob URL.
frontend/src/components/community/PostLi: Shows like count and toggles liking/unliking a post with authentication.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main site layout with header navigation, outlet content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Displays a centered loading spinner with an optional message.
frontend/src/components/Nav.tsx: Renders desktop and mobile navigation menus with active link highlighting.
frontend/src/components/profiles/Profile: Renders a grid of profile images using direct blob URLs.
Lists external profile links, ensuring URLs are safely formatted.
frontend/src/content/articles.ts: Defines article interface and provides static article data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor based on the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, directory listings, and follow data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for posts, events, likes, and admin checks using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaticAssetAvailab: Checks availability of a static asset URL using a cached query with robust fallback logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a pastel-themed color palette for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, values, offerings, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full article based on slug, with category, read time, summary, and rendered body; shows a not-found message if missing.
frontend/src/pages/ArticlesPage.tsx: Lists all articles in card form with category, read time, title, and summary, linking to individual detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ColoringPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityBoardPage.ts: Implements a community board with post listing, creation, editing, deletion, and optional image attachments, including validation and preview handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form that opens a mailto link and an option to copy the contact email to clipboard.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays events and includes a form for authenticated users to create new events with validation and timestamp formatting.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a static gallery of plushie images with titles and descriptions in a grid layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring a hero section with branding, navigation buttons, and fallback hero image handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Component that loads a user profile and follow/like summaries, and provides UI actions for following and liking with error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilesDirectoryPage: Lists public profiles with avatars and bios, handling loading and error states, and renders a grid of profile cards.
frontend/src/utils/actorError.ts: Normalizes backend error objects into readable messages for common authorization and validation cases.
frontend/src/utils/imageAttachment.ts: Utilities for validating, converting, and formatting image files used as attachments, including size/type checks.
frontend/src/utils/profileImages.ts: Helpers for converting files to ExternalBlob format, generating preview URLs, and accessing direct blob URLs.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetCheck.ts: Checks availability of a static asset using HEAD or fallback GET requests with abort handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, shadows, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current versioned state, including visual/theme directives, feature requirements, moderation rules, profile behavior, and known UI issues for the Plushie Haven site.
